autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I ever felt envious of others' good fortune and secretly wished they would lose their blessings?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I felt discontent when others have achieved success, and secretly wished they would lose their accomplishments?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words that were vulgar or inappropriate , thereby violating the dignity of others
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in using words that were vulgar or inappropriate, thereby violating the dignity of others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others using hurtful or impolite words, thereby violating their dignity and causing them harm?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that was unbecoming of me
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a way that was unbecoming of me?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading me to prioritize pleasure over moderation and potentially harming my physical or mental health?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, neglecting my responsibility to use food and drink for nourishment and not for pleasure?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial obligations, causing me to neglect my responsibilities towards myself and others?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations and family needs
to wastefulness and neglect of God - given responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I excessively prioritized entertainment and leisure activities over my financial obligations and family needs, leading to wastefulness and neglect of God-given responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking critically about others ' private lives
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in speaking critically about others' private lives, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing my friends ' private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing my friends' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private details about friends , acquaintances , or colleagues through casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private details about friends, acquaintances, or colleagues through casual conversations?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger against someone, rather than seeking reconciliation?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
